scripts.lib:publish:patch: cd lib && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && npm publish --access public
